item.title: Creating PDF Articles with LaTeX
item.description: Introduction Often times in data science, or other areas of study, the requirement of writing an article and converting it to PDF will be needed. This post will demonstrate how to use LaTeX to create an article. Our example will be using an R package called janeaustenr to create a wordcloud from her novel “Sense & Sensibility”. Gathering the Data First, we will import our libraries and store the data we want to use in a dataframe.
